College of Applied Health Sciences     Search the site      Toggle Menu     Search             College of Applied Health Sciences     College of Applied Health Sciences   Google Translate  Main Menu    Applying          Degrees and Deadlines    Beyond the Classroom    Tuition and Aid    Newly Admitted Students      Academics           Departments and Programs         Biomedical and Health Information Sciences           Disability and Human Development           Kinesiology and Nutrition           Occupational Therapy           Physical Therapy           Rehabilitation Sciences         Departments and Programs      Research          Research Labs and Centers    Metabolic Kitchen      Community Services          Assistive Technology Unit    Developmental Disabilities Family Clinic    Occupational Therapy Faculty Practice    Physical Therapy Faculty Practice      Alumni          Give to AHS          Give to AHS    Where to Give      AHS Alumni Awards          Alumni Award Recipients      Meet Our Alumni    Corporate Partners Program    News    Events    Contact      About AHS          College News    College Calendar    Committees    Contact       Eyebrow menu    Inside AHS    AHS Directory    Give to AHS    UIC menu    UIC.edu    UI Health    Campus Map      Search the site                     COVID-19 on Inside AHS  COVID-19 updates, resources and announcements for AHS students, faculty and staff        View Menu            Breadcrumbs   Home  AHS Alumni  AHS Alumni Awards      AHS Alumni Awards  Nominate yourself or a classmate you admire for an AHS Alumni Award  We are immensely proud of our many accomplished alumni who are forging award-worthy careers in business, nonprofit, government and academia.  We honor several each year through the AHS Alumni Awards program:   AHS Distinguished Alumni Achievement Award  AHS Loyalty Award  AHS New Alum Award   Details on each award are below. Nominations can be made at any time.  Whenever possible, the college confers at least one award in each category. Award winners are recognized during AHS CELEBRATES in spring. Honorees must be present to receive their awards.                2020 AHS Distinguished Alumni Achievement Award recipient    Grace Baranek ’81 BS OT   Associate Dean and Chair, Mrs. T.H. Chan Division of Occupational Science and Occupational Therapy, University of Southern California     See all our past award recipients        AHS Distinguished Alumni Achievement Award   Established in 1987, this is the highest honor bestowed upon alumni of the UIC College of Applied Health Sciences (by the college’s current or former names). It is presented to alumni who have attained outstanding success and national or international distinction in their chosen profession or life’s work, and whose accomplishments reflect admirably on or bring honor to their alma mater.       Nominate now        AHS Loyalty Award   This award is bestowed upon alumni of the UIC College of Applied Health Sciences (by the college’s current or former names) who have made significant, notable and meritorious contributions, and who have consistently demonstrated exceptional loyalty, commitment, dedication and service to the college and/or one of its departments for the advancement of their alma mater.       Nominate now        AHS New Alum Award   UIC College of Applied Health Sciences alumni are a wide array of interesting and accomplished people. To celebrate, we honor up to two recent alumni (graduated within 10 years) whose careers and lives are on the rise.       Nominate now              Questions?   Have questions about the AHS Alumni Awards program? Contact Keenan Cutsforth for help with submissions, details on AHS CELEBRATES and more.    You can contact me at:     Email  keenanc@uic.edu      Phone  312-996-1339      Address  808 S.
